means: <法>帮助记忆的东西，（外交上的）备忘录

sentence.Network_en: An aide avowed that the President had known nothing of the deals.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位助理声明，总统对这些交易一无所知。

sentence.Network_en: The brothers chip in a certain amount of money each month to hire a home health aide.
sentence.Network_cn: 兄弟几个每个月凑一笔钱，请了一个家庭护理。

PerfectNetExp.abs: aider and abettor 帮助教唆犯,教唆帮助犯aide-memoire 外交备忘录aim of punishment 刑罚目的
晾干aide-memoire【法】(外交上之)备忘录 Air Marshal(英国)空军中将 airdrome【美】飞机场;空军基地 ailurophobia【心】恐猫症 air force空军air-mail航空邮递的.

list.exp: 审核员之引导及备忘录
list.abs: ...审核工作的完整性审核作为审核员之引导及备忘录审核员之引导及备忘录(aide-memoir) 作为审核员之引导及备忘录审核的客观证 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French aide-mémoire, from aider 'to help' and mémoire 'memory'

entry.tran: 帮助记忆的东西；备忘录
entry.def: An aide-memoire is something such as a list that you use to remind you of something.

means.word_mean: 1. a memorandum summarizing the items of an agreement (used especially in diplomatic communications)

auth_sentence.content: Bloomberg, according to the aide, was appalled.
